title: [K-12] Remote Project-based Social Education Course Design for Corporate Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Project Management and Experience in Operating Social Organizations
context.additional_context: Non-degree social education program conducted via PBL in a BYOD environment, aiming to strengthen competencies through learner collaboration and practical case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can develop project plans based on real-world corporate cases within four weeks
Learners can communicate effectively with team members using remote collaboration tools
Learners can derive at least three measurable indicators for assessing social impact by the end of the course
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
